TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewColumn extends System.Windows.DependencyObject implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

type GridViewColumn = class inherit DependencyObject interface INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示顯示資料的資料行。

span.span: Represents a column that displays data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A正由檢視模式中顯示資料行。A is used by the view mode to display a column of data. 實作檢視模式會提供資料給資料行。The that implements the view mode provides the data for the column. 您可以使用資料繫結至指定的資料。You use data binding to specify the data for the . 您可以使用屬性可定義要顯示的資料行中的資料。You can use the property to define the data to display in a column. 您也可以定義資料的一部分所指定屬性。You can also define the data as part of a that is specified by the property. 如果不同的儲存格具有不同物件屬性可以指定。If different cells have different objects, the property can specify a . 下列清單會顯示一提，依順序的優先順序最高到低排列的屬性：The following list shows the properties mentioned here, in their order of precedence from highest to lowest: - - - 類別也包含可用來定義和自訂資料行的資料行標頭的屬性。The class also contains properties that you can use to define and customize the column header for the column. 屬性可以定義資料行標頭的內容。The property can define the content of the column header. 其他屬性，例如和也可以指定內容和資料行標頭的樣式。Other properties such as and can also specify content and style for the column header. 其中某些屬性也上找到其他類別例如類別。Some of these properties are also found on other classes such as the class. 如需可用來定義樣式和範本資料行標頭，以及如需這些屬性的優先順序資訊屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).For more information about the properties that are used to define styles and templates for column headers, and for information about the order of precedence for these properties, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 類別會實作 介面。The class implements the interface. 這個介面可讓您訂閱事件發生時發生變更屬性值，例如屬性值。This interface provides the ability to subscribe to the events that occur when a change occurs to a property value, such as the property value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義物件。The following example shows how to define objects for a . [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#GridViewColumnContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumncontent)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性取得的目前寬度時屬性設定為。You can use this property to get the current width of the when the property is set to . 值為如屬性會指定資料行大小容納的最大的可見項目不是資料行標頭。A value of for the property specifies that the column size accommodate the largest visible item that is not the column header. 不同於，不是相依性屬性。Unlike , is not a dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，讓資料行顯示一組值，該類型的資料來源的資料行的資料類型產生關聯的屬性。The property associates a type of data from a data source to a column so that the column displays a set of values of that type. 資料來源物件的範例包括物件和物件。Examples of data source objects include objects and objects. 下列屬性用來定義的內容和資料行儲存格樣式和此處以從最高到最低的優先順序，順序列出：The following properties are all used to define the content and style of a column cell, and are listed here in their order of precedence, from highest to lowest: - - - ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. summary.span: 取得或設定 行首的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the header of a .

value.span: 用於資料行行首的物件。

span.span: The object to use for the column header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以設定為物件，只要`string`，或物件的複雜到像包含內嵌內容。The property can be set to an object that is as simple as a `string`, or to an object that is as complex as a that has embedded content. 中的預設欄標題檢視模式的樣式為衍生自按鈕且具有的內容做為其子系的屬性。The default column header in a view mode is styled as a button that is derived from and that has the content of the property as its child. 若要指定資料行標頭的範本，請參閱或屬性描述。To specify a template for the column header, see the or property descriptions. 在許多相關的類別，所列出的內容、 配置和資料行標頭的樣式定義的屬性，其中某些屬性具有功能類似或相同。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於 行首的樣式。

value.span: ，可定義資料行行首的顯示屬性。

span.span: The that defines the display properties for the column header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性和屬性可以共同定義屬性值和資料行的標頭內容的視覺化樹狀。The property and the property can together define property values and the visual tree for column header content. 屬性也可以藉由定義指定的視覺化樹狀結構。The property can also specify the visual tree by defining a . 在許多相關類別中，所列出的內容、 配置和資料行標頭的樣式定義的屬性，其中某些屬性具有功能類似或相同。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found in many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 當您設定樣式時，某些限制。When you set a style, some restrictions apply. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或屬性設定，則會忽略這個屬性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 您可以使用數個屬性來指定資料行標頭的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果設定多個屬性，具有最高優先權的屬性值以格式化資料行標頭。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以數種類型上設定資料行的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 下列清單顯示的屬性可以用來格式化資料行標頭，從最低到最高優先順序排序：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果兩個屬性和屬性已設定，屬性會優先。If both the property and the property are set, the property takes precedence. 之後或指定，就無法變更。After a or is specified for a , it cannot be changed. 您也可以藉由指定定義資料行標頭的顯示一部分。You can also define the display of a column header by specifying a as part of a . 在許多相關的類別，所列出的內容、 配置和資料行標頭的樣式定義的屬性，其中某些屬性具有功能類似或相同。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
